meanings.definition: In a manner that derives pleasure from experiencing pain or humiliation.
meanings.sent1: She masochistically enjoyed watching horror movies late at night.
meanings.sent2: He always chooses the most masochistically challenging workout routines.
meanings.sent3: The cat masochistically kept chasing its tail in circles.
meanings.sent4: The student masochistically volunteered to do the most difficult task in class.
meanings.sent5: The chef masochistically tasted the extremely spicy dish, tears streaming down his face.

meanings.definition: In a way that involves seeking out suffering or discomfort for enjoyment.
meanings.sent1: The thrill-seeker masochistically rode the roller coaster multiple times in a row.
meanings.sent2: She masochistically signed up for the extreme wilderness survival course.
meanings.sent3: The toddler masochistically kept touching the hot stove despite being warned.
meanings.sent4: The explorer masochistically ventured into the heart of the jungle, facing all its dangers.
meanings.sent5: The artist masochistically pushed through sleepless nights to finish the masterpiece on time.
